ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: National University of Ireland, Galway (NUI Galway)

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: National University of Ireland, Galway (NUI Galway)

SHORT_DESCR.P: NUI Galway seeks to appoint external clinical research associates that will deliver the monitoring element of NUI Galway’s sponsored regulated medical device clinical trials in line with the agreed monitoring strategy/plan, provide site management and provide in-country knowledge and support for ethics and regulatory submissions and re-submissions.

NUI Galway seeks to appoint external clinical research associates that will deliver the monitoring element of NUI Galway’s sponsored regulated medical device clinical trials in line with the agreed monitoring strategy/plan, provide site management and provide in-country knowledge and support for ethics and regulatory submissions and re-submissions.

This service may be required in multiple countries as follows: Austria, Lithuania, Belgium, Luxembourg, Bulgaria, Malta, Croatia, Netherlands, Cyprus, Poland, Czechia, Portugal, Denmark, Romania, Estonia, Slovakia, Finland, Slovenia, France, Spain, Germany, Sweden, Hungary, UK, Ireland, Switzerland, Italy, Greece, Latvia, Turkey.

INFO_ADD.P: Candidates are advised refer to the associated documentation available to download from www.etenders.gov.ie using RFT ID 166858.

SUITABILITY.P: Please refer to the associated documentation available to download from www.etenders.gov.ie using RFT ID 166858.

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: Please refer to tender documentation provided to qualified firms invited to the second stage of the process.
